entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
